projects.name: Blood Donation Drive 2024
projects.objective: To collect over 120 units of blood to address critical medical needs.
projects.overview: In collaboration with Minatai Blood Bank, the event collected over 170 units of blood, exceeding its initial target and reflecting the community's generosity.

projects.name: ABHIMAT 2024
projects.objective: To test and refine students' effective speaking, critical thinking, and communication skills while engaging in thoughtful discussions on pressing national issues.
projects.overview: The Lok Sabha-style debate brought together students to deliberate on significant bills such as EWS reservation and the privatization of public sector companies. Organized collaboratively by IEEE WIE SPIT, IIC SPIT, and ENACTUS SPIT, the event provided a platform for students to showcase their debating skills and parliamentary acumen.

keyOutcomes.participants: Took on the roles of political parties and engaged in thought-provoking discussions.

projects.name: Blood Donation Drive 2023
projects.objective: To collect over 100 units of blood to meet medical needs.
projects.overview: A successful initiative that aimed to collect over 100 units of blood to support essential medical needs. The event saw an impressive turnout, fostering a sense of community.

projects.name: Cloth Donation Drive 2023
projects.objective: To collect over 250 units of various types of clothing for children.
projects.overview: The drive aimed to collect clothing for children in need. It was an overwhelming success with strong participation from students and faculty.

projects.name: ABHIMAT 2023
projects.objective: To encourage intellectual engagement and provide a platform for participants to express their views on pressing national issues.
projects.overview: ENACTUS SPIT, in collaboration with IEEE WIE SPIT and IIC SPIT, organized Abhimat: The Lok Sabha Debate, a dynamic event held in the Seminar Hall of S.P.I.T. Participants showcased their debating prowess, gained knowledge on diverse topics, and networked with like-minded individuals. With a prize pool exceeding ₹10,000, the event saw enthusiastic participation, leaving a lasting impact on all attendees.

keyOutcomes.impact: Fostered intellectual growth and inspired democratic dialogue

projects.name: EPIC 2023
projects.venue: Sardar Patel Institute of Technology, Mumbai
projects.objective: To inspire and empower budding entrepreneurs to pitch innovative social impact ideas and compete for a prize pool of Rs. 10,000.
projects.overview: EPIC 2023, organized by ENACTUS S.P.I.T. in collaboration with IIC S.P.I.T., brought together aspiring entrepreneurs for a high-energy pitch competition inspired by Shark Tank. Teams of up to four members presented their social entrepreneurship ideas to a panel of distinguished judges.

keyOutcomes.participants: Teams from diverse disciplines enthusiastically presented their ideas.

projects.name: WEBINAR 2022
projects.objective: To inspire and educate future change makers on embracing social entrepreneurship and adopting sustainable e-waste management practices.
projects.overview: ENACTUS S.P.I.T., in collaboration with the Institution’s Innovation Council (IIC), hosted a webinar on ‘Social Entrepreneurship and Sustainable Disposal of E-Waste’ featuring Mr. Pranshu Singhal.

keyOutcomes.attendance: An overwhelming response from students and external participants.
keyOutcomes.impact: Sparked deeper understanding of responsible entrepreneurship and motivated attendees.

projects.name: Project Unnati
projects.objective: To uplift underprivileged children by providing primary education and meals, and create an innovative app to support secondary school students in rural areas.
projects.overview: A flagship initiative by Enactus S.P.I.T. aimed at providing education and nourishment to children across India, focusing on both immediate and long-term goals like bridging the education gap through technology.

projects.name: Project Prithvi
projects.objective: To tackle environmental issues by promoting sustainable alternatives to plastic.
projects.overview: An initiative aimed at encouraging the use of eco-friendly materials and reducing plastic consumption, supported by workshops and collaborations with local artisans.

keyOutcomes.impact: Raised awareness on plastic waste reduction.
